job.title: Software Engineer - Front End
job.description: ltstronggtltugtabout the opportunityltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggt hey were grubhub ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwere all about connecting hungry diners with our network of over restaurants nationwide innovative technology userfriendly platforms and streamlined delivery capabilities set us apart and make us an industry leader in the world of online food ordering when you join our team you become part of a community that works together to innovate solve problems grow work hard and have a ton of fun in the processltbrgtltbrgtltstronggt why work for us ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwe are looking for a frontend engineer to join our organization the candidate will be working on a small agile team that is responsible for our reactbased web application that is vital to our restaurant partners we emphasize building stable and scalable solutions as our team is responsible for the management of km food orders per day we pride ourselves on giving the best user experience possible with an emphasis on simple design and providing delight to our restaurant partnersltbrgtltbrgtltstronggt the impact you will make ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligt design implement and deliver awesome technical platforms and products for all constituencies diners corporate accounts restaurants internal tools ltligtltligt understand our products from both a technical and business perspective in the context of our larger business ltligtltligt communicate with leadership product owners other technologists and users to create working software based on an understanding of business and technical priorities ltligtltligt break down complex problems into elegant technical solutions to intelligently solve problems for diners restaurant corporate accounts and internal stakeholders ltligtltligt actively contribute to the adoption of strong software architecture development best practices and new technologies we are always improving the process of building software we need you to help contribute ltligtltligt you will be a key part in accurately estimating the timing of software delivery ltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtwhat you bring to the tableltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt bachelors or masters degree in computer science software engineering or related field ltligtltligt solid foundation in software programming in javascript ltligtltligt experience in react preferred ltligtltligt experience with typescript a plus ltligtltligt eagerness to contribute in a teamoriented environment ltligtltligt ability to work creatively and analytically in a problemsolving environment ltligtltligt familiar with agile software development methodologies ltligtltligt interested in working for a fast paced tech and product oriented company ltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggt and of course perks ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligt ltstronggt flexible pto ltstronggtltstronggt ltstronggt grubhub employees enjoy a generous amount of time to recharge ltligtltligt ltstronggt health and wellness ltstronggt excellent medical benefits employee network groups and paid parental leave are just a few of our programs to support your overall wellbeing ltligtltligt ltstronggt competitive pay youll receive a competitive base salary with eligibility for generous incentives bonuses commission or rsus rolespecific ltstronggt ltligtltligt ltstronggt learning and career growth ltstronggt your personal and professional development is a priority at grubhub we empower you to be a leader and grow your career through training coaching and mentorship opportunities ltligtltligt ltstronggt mealperks ltstronggt get meals on us our employees get a weekly grubhub credit to enjoy and support local restaurants ltligtltligt ltstronggt fun ltstronggt every grubhub office has an employeeled culture crew that connects people through fun meaningful events and initiatives like wellness wednesdays slack competitions and virtual happy hours ltligtltligt ltstronggt social impact ltstronggt at grubhub we believe in giving back through programs like the grubhub community relief fund and donating million to the equal justice initiative in employees are also given paid time off each year to support the causes that are important to them ltligtltligt ltstronggt covid response ltstronggt all of our employees are currently working from home and will be for the foreseeable future we look forward to seeing everyone inoffice when its safe to return ltbrgtltligtltulgtgrubhub is an equal opportunity employer we welcome diversity and encourage a workplace that is just as diverse as the customers we serve we evaluate qualified applicants without regard to race color religion age sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin disability veteran status and other legally protected characteristics if youre applying for a job in the us and need a reasonable accommodation for any part of the employment process please send an email to talentacquisitiongrubhubcom and let us know the nature of your request and contact information please note that only those inquiries concerning a request for reasonable accommodation will be
